R

removeEvent(String, CalendarEvent) - Method in class controller.CalendarController
Takes a CalendarModel and removes an event from it
removeEvent(CalendarEvent) - Method in class model.CalendarModel
Remove a CalendarEvent from this calendar
removeEvents() - Method in class view.MonthView
This method removes events from each pane This method removes all of the events from the panes in the grid so new events can be updated for the month.
renameCalendar(String, String) - Method in class controller.CalendarController
Renames a CalendarModel in the map that keeps track of all of the different calendars
renameCalendar(ActionEvent) - Method in class view.CalendarView
event handler to rename an existing calendar uses both CalendarView.selectOneCalendar(String) and CalendarView.getNewCalendarName(String)
root - Variable in class view.DayView
 
root - Variable in class view.WeekView
 
ROW_HEIGHT - Static variable in class view.WeekView
